title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 136.3 - Grounds for immediate denial of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 136.3 - Grounds for immediate denial of application

State Regulations

An application for a driver's license shall be denied
without further review if: (a) the
minimum waiting period provided by statute has not expired; and/or
(b) there is evidence of an open suspension
or suspensions which have not been fully complied with; and/or
(c) the applicant fails to furnish any
requested document or information required by the commissioner as part of the
record review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
136.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
